sentence.english: She isn't visiting her aunt this weekend.
sentence.spanish: Ella no visita a su tía este fin de semana.

sentence.english: Are we meeting your brother tomorrow?
sentence.spanish: ¿Nos encontramos con tu hermano mañana?

sentence.english: Does he play football with his brother-in-law?
sentence.spanish: ¿Juega al fútbol con su cuñado?

sentence.english: They weren't taking their children to school.
sentence.spanish: Ellos no llevaban a sus hijos al colegio.

sentence.english: She wasn't close to her cousin growing up.
sentence.spanish: Ella no era cercana a su prima de pequeña.

sentence.english: Are you calling your dad tonight?
sentence.spanish: ¿Llamas a tu papá esta noche?

sentence.english: He doesn't understand his daughter's music.
sentence.spanish: Él no entiende la música de su hija.

sentence.english: Does she often visit her daughter-in-law?
sentence.spanish: ¿Visita ella a menudo a su nuera?

sentence.english: I was talking to my father yesterday.
sentence.spanish: Hablaba con mi padre ayer.

sentence.english: Is he working with his father-in-law?
sentence.spanish: ¿Trabaja con su suegro?

sentence.english: They weren't forgetting their goddaughter's birthday.
sentence.spanish: Ellos no olvidaban el cumpleaños de su ahijada.

sentence.english: Does she have a good relationship with her godfather?
sentence.spanish: ¿Tiene buena relación con su padrino?

sentence.english: I was chosen as godmother last year.
sentence.spanish: Me eligieron de madrina el año pasado.

sentence.english: Is he buying a present for his godson?
sentence.spanish: ¿Compra un regalo para su ahijado?

sentence.english: They are looking after their grandchildren today.
sentence.spanish: Ellos cuidan de sus nietos hoy.

sentence.english: She doesn't see her granddaughter often.
sentence.spanish: Ella no ve a su nieta a menudo.

sentence.english: Does she visit her grandfather every Sunday?
sentence.spanish: ¿Visita a su abuelo todos los domingos?

sentence.english: Were you playing with your grandson in the park?
sentence.spanish: ¿Jugabas con tu nieto en el parque?

sentence.english: They weren't listening to their grandmother's stories.
sentence.spanish: Ellos no escuchaban las historias de su abuela.

sentence.english: Is he staying with his grandparents this summer?
sentence.spanish: ¿Se queda con sus abuelos este verano?

sentence.english: He doesn't call his grandmother 'Granny'.
sentence.spanish: Él no llama 'abuelita' a su abuela.

sentence.english: I was fishing with Grandpa last weekend.
sentence.spanish: Pescaba con el abuelito el fin de semana pasado.

sentence.english: She wasn't close to her great-aunt.
sentence.spanish: Ella no era cercana a su tía abuela.

sentence.english: They are celebrating their great-granddaughter's birthday.
sentence.spanish: Ellos celebran el cumpleaños de su bisnieta.

sentence.english: Were you named after your great-grandfather?
sentence.spanish: ¿Te pusieron el nombre de tu bisabuelo?

sentence.english: She doesn't remember her great-grandmother.
sentence.spanish: Ella no recuerda a su bisabuela.

sentence.english: Does he have any great-grandsons?
sentence.spanish: ¿Tiene bisnietos?

sentence.english: Are you researching your great-uncle's history?
sentence.spanish: ¿Investigas la historia de tu tío abuelo?

sentence.english: She wasn't invited to her half-brother's wedding.
sentence.spanish: Ella no estaba invitada a la boda de su medio hermano.

sentence.english: Does he share a room with his half-sister?
sentence.spanish: ¿Comparte habitación con su media hermana?

sentence.english: Does she trust her husband completely?
sentence.spanish: ¿Confía completamente en su marido?

sentence.english: Is he playing with the kids in the garden?
sentence.spanish: ¿Juega con los niños en el jardín?

sentence.english: He doesn't call his wife 'the missus'.
sentence.spanish: Él no llama 'mi señora' a su esposa.

sentence.english: She doesn't argue with her mother often.
sentence.spanish: Ella no discute con su madre a menudo.

sentence.english: She doesn't argue with her mother-in-law.
sentence.spanish: Ella no discute con su suegra.

sentence.english: Were you talking to Mum about the problem?
sentence.spanish: ¿Hablabas con mamá sobre el problema?

sentence.english: Does he teach his nephew to play chess?
sentence.spanish: ¿Enseña a su sobrino a jugar al ajedrez?

sentence.english: They are buying a gift for their niece.
sentence.spanish: Ellos compran un regalo para su sobrina.

sentence.english: She wasn't referring to her husband as 'the old man'.
sentence.spanish: Ella no se refería a su marido como 'mi viejo'.

sentence.english: Are you visiting your parents this Christmas?
sentence.spanish: ¿Visitas a tus padres esta Navidad?

sentence.english: Were you visiting your parents-in-law last weekend?
sentence.spanish: ¿Visitabas a tus suegros el fin de semana pasado?

sentence.english: He doesn't live with his partner.
sentence.spanish: Él no vive con su pareja.

sentence.english: I was visiting my uncle in hospital.
sentence.spanish: Visitaba a mi tío en el hospital.

sentence.english: He doesn't have any siblings.
sentence.spanish: Él no tiene hermanos.

sentence.english: Are you calling your sister every day?
sentence.spanish: ¿Llamas a tu hermana todos los días?

sentence.english: They weren't speaking to their sister-in-law.
sentence.spanish: Ellos no hablaban con su cuñada.

sentence.english: I was helping my son with homework yesterday.
sentence.spanish: Ayudaba a mi hijo con los deberes ayer.

sentence.english: They are proud of their son-in-law.
sentence.spanish: Ellos están orgullosos de su yerno.

sentence.english: She wasn't traveling with her spouse last month.
sentence.spanish: Ella no viajaba con su cónyuge el mes pasado.

sentence.english: Were you arguing with your stepbrother yesterday?
sentence.spanish: ¿Discutías con tu hermanastro ayer?

sentence.english: Are they picking up their stepdaughter from school?
sentence.spanish: ¿Recogen a su hijastra de la escuela?

sentence.english: Does he get along with his stepfather?
sentence.spanish: ¿Se lleva bien con su padrastro?

sentence.english: They are meeting their stepmother for lunch.
sentence.spanish: Ellos se reúnen con su madrastra para almorzar.

sentence.english: I'm not sharing a room with my stepsister anymore.
sentence.spanish: Ya no comparto habitación con mi hermanastra.

sentence.english: He was teaching his stepson to drive last year.
sentence.spanish: Él enseñaba a conducir a su hijastro el año pasado.

sentence.english: Does he always discuss decisions with his wife?
sentence.spanish: ¿Discute siempre las decisiones con su esposa?
